USER_NAME = #userName:VARCHAR#
PASSWORD = #password:VARCHAR#
USER_ROLE = #userRole:VARCHAR#
AUTHORITY_LIST = #authorityList:VARCHAR#
MERCHANT_NAME = #merchantName:VARCHAR#
OPERATE_CLASS = #operateClass:VARCHAR#
ADDRESS = #address:VARCHAR#
ADDRESS_DETAILS = #addressDetails:VARCHAR#
COM_TELPHONE = #comTelphone:VARCHAR#
COM_PERSON_NUM = #comPersonNum:VARCHAR#
REGISTER_MONEY = #registerMoney:VARCHAR#
LINK_MAN = #linkMan:VARCHAR#
EMAIL = #email:VARCHAR#
QQ = #qq:VARCHAR#
OPERATING_LICENSES_ID = #operatingLicensesId:VARCHAR#
OPERATING_AREA = #operatingArea:VARCHAR#
EXPIRY_START_DATE = #expiryStartDate:TIMESTAMP#
EXPIRY_END_DATE = #expiryEndDate:TIMESTAMP#

OPERATING_LICENSES_URL = #operatingLicensesUrl:VARCHAR#

LEGALPERSON_IDCARD_FRONT = #legalpersonIdcardFront:VARCHAR#
LEGALPERSON_IDCARD_VERSO = #legalpersonIdcardVerso:VARCHAR#

MEARCHANT_TYPE = #mearchantType:VARCHAR#

where MERCHANT_ID = #merchantId:VARCHAR#
